name: fundamental-vue
description: SAP Fiori Fundamentals, implemented in Vue.js
author: SAP SE

scripts.test:e2e: start-server-and-test 'serve:demo' http://localhost:10000 'cross-env FD_E2E=true vue-cli-service test:e2e --url http://localhost:10000'
scripts.test:e2e:dev: start-server-and-test 'serve:demo:dev' http://localhost:10000 'cross-env FD_E2E=true vue-cli-service test:e2e --url http://localhost:10000'
scripts.test:e2e:headless: start-server-and-test 'serve:demo' http://localhost:10000 'cross-env FD_E2E=true vue-cli-service test:e2e --url http://localhost:10000 --headless'
scripts.build: rimraf -r dist && cross-env NODE_ENV=production yarn build:bili && cross-env NODE_ENV=production yarn build:src
scripts.build:bili: bili --bundle-node-modules --file-name FundamentalVue.[format].js --format cjs --format umd-min --format es --module-name FundamentalVue --env.NODE_ENV production -d dist
scripts.serve:demo: cd demo && cross-env FD_E2E=true vue-cli-service serve index.js --port 10000 --mode production
scripts.serve:demo:dev: cd demo && cross-env FD_E2E=true vue-cli-service serve index.js --port 10000 --mode development
scripts.build:docs: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=8192 node src/tools/index && NODE_ENV=production; NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=8192 vue-cli-service build src/docs/index.js
scripts.build:ui:dev: vue-cli-service build --target lib --report --name FundamentalVue src/index.js --mode development
scripts.lint:pre-commit:
printf "running pre-commit lint..."  && yarn lint && printf "done!
"
